content.webTitle: National Express picks up speed in second half

fields.headline: National Express picks up speed in second half
fields.bodyText: National Express will exceed its expectations this year after a strong performance from its bus and coach divisions and an improvement in its trains business in the second half. The coach division notched up passenger growth of 5.5%. The company highlighted its Spanish bus business, Alsa, which boosted passenger numbers through internet sales and fare deals. Passenger growth also picked up at the trains division - which includes the Midland mainline. It will submit its bids for the east Midlands and new cross-country franchises in February and March.
